CompanyName.label: Company Name
CompanyName.value: Blackrock Capital and Income Strategies Fund Inc

Address.label: Address
Address.value: 100 BELLEVUE PARKWAY, WILMINGTON, Delaware, United States

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: The Trust seeks to achieve its investment objective by investing in a portfolio of equity securities of U.S. and foreign issuers. The Trust may invest directly in such securities or synthetically through the use of derivatives. The Trust also seeks to achieve its investment objective by employing a strategy of writing selling call and put options.
